Waist is not tight, dress is not tight anywhere, just short from front to back. Had to return.
Beautiful summer dress I bought it to take on a cruise It fits very comfortable and it’s true to size

评论概述: VERY Pretty but too Short Waisted
评论详情: Very pretty dress but short waisted for me and I'm only 5'7". I do have a longer waist but nothing abnormal and most dresses fit. The sleeves of this are very pretty and sheer but not too sheer. It's very feminine and flowy. I got the black flowered one and it was pretty (I was afraid it would look too tacky or cheap but it didn't). It was just too short waisted for me - mostly the back. I could've possibly made it work from the front but the back was a few inches too short in the waist and looked goofy...hit right under my bra line in the back. But if you're around the 5'4-5'5" range or shorter this will be perfect. Accomodated a large bust as well. Would be great with black tights and black booties.
El vestido es hermosísimo. La talla corresponde, la tela , la caída del vestido y la fluidez es tal cual el vídeo. Se adapta al cuerpo y se ve una forma bonita.
This dress looks beautiful online and the fit was nice. Unfortunately, the quality is poor and it is poorly sewed. The hem on my dress was falling apart as I tried it on. Returned ASAP.
Love the color , fit ,flare can't wait to wear it .
Love this dress! Super flattering and quality material. I am buying in more colors!
I was really impressed with the fit and material of this dress.

Bought this dress and at first glance it is decent quality and has the potential to be very flattering. However, after trying it on a couple of times and messing with the tie in the back I knew something was not right. One arm was significantly shorter than the other and it felt like one shoulder was pulling weird. Turns out the left arm was sewn on UPSIDE DOWN. Not something you can fix with a safety pin... returned.

Love the color and fabric weight and the flow. Around the waist, it needs a belt because it's kind of bulky and makes you look big on your chest. That's the only thing I didn't like. Now I have to buy a belt. I'll keep it.

评论概述: LOVE!! Go ahead and order it ladies!
评论详情: This is a size small I weigh about 150 pounds, fits perfectly. I can lift my arms and my butt is no where near showing. I’m not one to leave reviews but I honestly wouldn’t mind this in every color and I’m very picky with clothes!!

评论概述: Pattern a little too much for me - RETURNED
评论详情: I returned this dress 5 days ago.  The pattern was just a little too bold for me - the reason for the 1 star may be more Amazon's fault than that of the dress or it's makers, but I have not gotten a return confirmation or refund yet.  Amazon is saying I have not returned it yet - but I did  and have my UPS store receipts.  But I have to wait 2 weeks to be able to lodge any kind of complaint.  This order (it was a BIG order, with several returns, as I am trying to find a dress for a wedding)  is the first time I have ever had any problems with a return to Amazon.  Frustrating enough to try to find a dress, but, then to be hampered financially for 2 weeks while still looking is problematic.

Looked great for fall wedding, wore with brown shoes. Sleeves are longer and sinched at the wrist but I pulled up. Fabric was light weight and flowy. For reference I'm 5' and the dress hit perfect a little above my knee. A dryer was able to get the wrinkles out.
It fits amazing color is amazing the material is great and comfortable! I am inlove with this dress!

This is a beautiful dress! Great fabric and it's super flattering! I tried a medium and large and ended up going with the large because it was more comfortable around the waist even though measurements were telling me to get a medium. Overall I am extremely happy with this dress and will most likely get more in different patterns!

I bought for a summer wedding. It’s was 95 that day and the dress wasn’t hot. Also I carry a lot of weight in my belly. The dress helped hide.

评论概述: Pretty dress with a light fabric
评论详情: Very light, flowy fabric. I am 140 lbs at 5.6 and I got a Medium. It fit well but I could have gone with a small…maybe. I wore it to a bridal shower and got compliments. I wish they had more darker colors in this dress. If you have a belly, you may see a slight bump under the smocking waistline and dark colors can hide it better. Giving it a 4 only because the waistline should be a bit lower for the dress to be more flattering. But otherwise a perfect dress.

Absolutely love this dress, very well made and fully lined. Perfect for any occasion, casual or dressy. No wrinkles even coming out of a shrink wrapped package, very impressed! Buying more for sure! At 5’4” it falls at the knee and the exactly the length I was looking to buy. Buying two more!

评论概述: Loved the Dress but fits small
评论详情: I loved this dress but unfortunately was too small. I am usually an XL(16/18) - 5'4 -185/195lbs - 38DD - sometimes size up to a 2X depending on the item. This one fits more like large, maybe even a bit medium.

This is hands down super cute!!!  It was one of those throw it on and WOW, it looks cute. Nothing I need to do further to make look better.  It was all there with its light and flowy fabric - not to mention pretty as heck!!  I LOVE the V-Neck too - extra flattering and sexy!!  GREAT Summer dress for any occasion you just want t look cute and KNOW it!!
Great fit for a great price! Loved the color!

评论概述: Pretty playful and flirty spring summer dress
评论详情: Pretty Spring or Summer casual dress. Comfortable, lightweight, breathable material. Has a lovely design from the waist down to the sleeves and this is a great length for comfort.  Has a little shirt under it to help with it being see-through in spots you don't wish it to be.  Over all, I love this little summer dress and yes I would order another.

The colors alone should be a reason for you to get this dress. It’s a stunner for sure! The fit is very flattering and flirty. It sits above my knee and I am 5’3. I am wearing a size small and my measurements are 36D-27-36 and it looked amazing! The dress has an elastic waist that cinches you in beautifully. You can just slide right into this dress. No zippers just a simple tie on the back of your neck. Veery easy, low maintenance dress, with a big reward. I would definitely recommend it.

Disclaimer: I got this for free from the vine program. I don't get paid for the review I just recieve the item for free. I try to base my reviews based on functionality, description provided, durability, and of course price.  This is a nice supper dress. It is airy. And looks nice. The material is not see through.

I love the fit of this dress it is very flattering and fits true to size. It does not have the appearance that it is see-through, at least not in the black colored background and pink rose pattern that I got. The thickness of the lining does a good job. The waist is smocked, I like the amount of the elasticity that it has. The material is light weight, it is flowy.  This dress is true to size, I would order your normal size. I am really pleased with it compared to other things that I have ordered on here haha hope this is helpful for you!
This dress fits great and feels good on. Not too tight and flows very well. No flaws and came as described. Hope to get a lot of use out of it even in the winter with some tights.
